mapper.insert: insert into sys_oper_log( title, business_type, method, request_method, operator_type, oper_name, oper_url, oper_param, json_result, status, error_msg, oper_time ) values ( #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operatorType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jsonResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{error_msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
